Title: VR Navigation Techniques
Abstract: We study virtual reality navigation and interaction in immersive environments.

Title: Neural Rendering Advances
Abstract: This paper explores radiance fields and neural rendering for photo-realistic views.

Title: Point Cloud Denoising
Abstract: We propose a method for denoising LiDAR point clouds using local features.

Title: Gesture Recognition Survey
Abstract: A comprehensive survey on gesture recognition and human-computer interaction.

Title: Medical Visualization with AR
Abstract: Techniques for augmented reality overlays in medical visualization applications.

Title: Style Transfer in Art
Abstract: We examine neural style transfer techniques for digital art and rendering.
